Name: Landmarks, 395 Flatbush Avenue Ext. Redevelopment, Brooklyn (N 260039 ZRK).
Title: Application number N 260039 ZRK (395 Flatbush Avenue Ext. Redevelopment) submitted by the NYC Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, amending provisions of Article X, Chapter 1 (Special Downtown Brooklyn District) and APPENDIX F for the purpose of establishing a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing area, Borough of Brooklyn, Community District 2, Council District 35.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
